definition: to pull/to turn (sth) around/to turn around (a situation)/to recoup
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Just reach into the powder and pull out your wrench.
sentences.chinese: 把手伸到粉末里把你的扳手拿出来。

sentences.english: Lend me a double-ended spanner please.
Click the wrench icon and select Options from the menu.
sentences.chinese: 点击扳手图标，在菜单里找到选项。

sentences.english: Vanessa shot out of the car wielding a monkey wrench and faced the guy down.
sentences.chinese: 瓦妮莎冲下车，操着一把活动扳手把他赶跑了。

sentences.english: Yeah, there is a real wrench out there.
sentences.chinese: 没错，一个五脏俱全的扳手。

sentences.english: Please give me the ring spanner.
Torque wrenches offer the precision measurement needed to tighten fasteners.
sentences.chinese: 力矩扳手没关系提供囚系螺栓所需的切确力矩计量。

sentences.english: Now consider being given a socket wrench.
sentences.chinese: 现在设想一下使用一个套筒扳手。

sentences.english: You can use a spanner to loosen the nut.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用扳手来松这个螺母。

sentences.english: I won the company produces torque wrench Shanghai high-tech science and technology award.
sentences.chinese: 我公司生产扭矩扳手荣获上海高新科技成果奖。

sentences.english: Keeps a good balance thanks to the equal interval fluting of lock pin and hook spanner.
sentences.chinese: 由于锁紧销和扳手槽的等距分布，平衡性好。

sentences.english: The spanner for dismantling the propeller is the steering gear room.
sentences.chinese: 拆螺旋桨用的扳手在舵机间。

sentences.english: The ring spanner is in my hand.
The labour droids were kind enough to offer Spanner shelter.
sentences.chinese: 那些劳工机器人非常友好地为“扳手”提供避难所。

sentences.english: I need a spanner to change the back wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我要一个扳手来换掉后面的轮胎。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
